entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
